sqlMap.select: SELECT t.id, DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS endTime FROM boss_tb_park_record t WHERE t.state= 'U' AND t.car_no = #carNo# ORDER BY t.start_time ASC
SELECT t.id, DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS endTime FROM boss_tb_park_record t WHERE t.state= 'U' AND t.id = #id#
